content:
### **🔥 Adjusted Posting Plan (Now That Yesterday’s Update is Live)**  

Now that you already **posted the update on the experiment yesterday**, today's post should focus on **announcing the next phase of the AI job automation experiment.**  

---

### **🔹 Today (Thursday) – Announcing Phase 2 (AI-Enhanced Job Applications)**
✅ **📌 Purpose:** Announce that we are moving to the **next phase of the AI experiment—applying for jobs as AI-enhanced Jesse with AI-assisted outreach.**  
✅ **📅 Timing:** **Post ASAP** (Before Keith’s post goes live, so it can be pinned in the comments).  
✅ **📑 Content:**  
- **Summary:**  
  - The first phase of the AI job automation experiment was a success.  
  - Now we’re **applying for real jobs using AI-enhanced resumes & AI-assisted outreach.**  
  - The **goal is not just to apply—but to demonstrate how AI can eliminate inefficiencies in hiring.**  
  - Results will be shared Monday.  

🔥 **Suggested Format:**  

**📢 Next Phase of the AI Job Automation Experiment 🚀**  

- The first phase of our AI-driven job search experiment showed massive engagement.  
- Now, we’re **testing AI in real-world job applications**—not just applying, but **showing how AI can enhance and automate roles.**  
- AI is handling **resume customization, outreach, and follow-ups**—changing how job applications work.  
- We’ll analyze the results Monday.  

**If you’re a hiring manager, what’s your biggest challenge with AI-enhanced hiring?** Let’s discuss. 👇  

**📝 Format:** **New LinkedIn Post** (ASAP so it can be pinned in Keith’s post comments).  

---

### **🔹 When Keith’s Post Goes Live (Comment & Reshare)**
✅ **📌 Purpose:** Leverage Keith’s audience to drive visibility to the AI experiment.  
✅ **📅 Timing:** **Within 5 minutes of Keith’s post going live.**  
✅ **📑 Content:**  
- Thank Keith & tie it into **AI’s impact on hiring.**  
- Mention that **you’re actively testing AI in job applications.**  
- Invite hiring managers to discuss **how they see AI transforming recruitment.**  

🔥 **Example Comment:**  
➡️ “Appreciate you sharing this, @Keith Krach! AI isn’t just streamlining work—it’s redefining **who does the work**. I’m actively testing an AI-powered job application model where AI enhances my resume, outreach, and even hiring interactions. Excited to share results on Monday—curious, how do you see AI changing hiring?”  

---

### **🔹 Monday – AI Job Experiment Results**
✅ **📌 Purpose:** Reveal the full AI job application experiment results.  
✅ **📅 Timing:** **Monday morning (8-10 AM ET).**  
✅ **📑 Content:**  
- Hook: **“I applied for a job that I plan to eliminate with AI—here’s what happened.”**  
- Breakdown of the **AI-enhanced job application process.**  
- **Initial responses from recruiters.**  
- Invite hiring managers to **submit job descriptions to analyze & automate.**  

🔥 **📝 Format:** **New LinkedIn Post on Monday.**  

---

### **🔥 Final Execution Checklist**
✅ **Post today’s update ASAP (next phase of the AI experiment).**  
✅ **Monitor for Keith’s post & engage within 5 minutes.**  
✅ **Reshare Keith’s post with insights (later today).**  
✅ **Finalize Monday’s post over the weekend.**  

🔥 **This locks in a high-engagement sequence & positions you as the AI-driven job search leader. 🚀**
